mapper.select: select rb.registered_book_id, rb.book_id, rb.seller_id, rb.order_count, rb.book_count, rb.register_date, rb.sell_status, 0, b.image_url, b.title from registered_book rb, book b where rb.book_id = b.book_id and rb.seller_id = #{sellerId} and rb.sell_status = #{sellStatus} and b.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select rb.registered_book_id, rb.book_id, rb.seller_id, rb.order_count, rb.book_count, rb.register_date, rb.sell_status, rb.discount_rate, b.image_url, b.title from registered_book rb, book b where rb.book_id = b.book_id and registered_book_id=#{registered_book_id}

select b.book_id, b.title, b.image_url from book b left join (select registered_book_id, book_id, sell_status from registered_book where seller_id = #{sellerId}) rb on b.book_id = rb.book_id where b.category = #{category} and (rb.book_id is null or rb.sell_status = 0)
